Package org.ginsim.core.graph.backend

Class NodeAttributeReaderImpl<V,​E extends Edge<V>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ginsim.core.graph.backend.NodeAttributeReaderImpl<V,​E>
  • Type Parameters:
    V - the vertex
    E - the edge
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    AttributesReader, NodeAttributesReader<V>
    public class NodeAttributeReaderImpl<V,​E extends Edge<V>>
extends Object
implements NodeAttributesReader<V>
    A generic nodeAttributeReader showing a unified view of default and node-specific styles (from the graph backend).
